Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1. Analyze the Request: Input A Pseudo-BPMN diagram describing a customer request process Standard vs Custom Parallel Checks Approval Invoice Goal Optimize the process to reduce turnaround times and increase flexibility for non-standard requests Specific Areas to Address Leverage automation Dynamically reallocate resources Incorporate predictive analytics proactive routing Required Components of the Answer Changes to relevant tasks Proposed new decision gateways or subprocesses Explanation of impact on Performance Customer Satisfaction and Operational Complexity 2. Deconstruct the Original Process Identify Pain Points Current Flow Receive Request Check Type Binary split Standard Validation Parallel Checks Credit Inventory Calc Date Custom Feasibility Analysis Feasible Quote or Reject Both Approval Required Manager Approval Granted Invoice or Re-evaluate Final Send Confirmation Pain Points Bottleneck Perform Custom Feasibility Analysis time-consuming manual Waiting Manager Approval queue Rigid Split Hardcoded Type logic Manual Re-evaluation slow No Context Approval after preparation

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Pain Points Hypothetical but implied Bottleneck Perform Custom Feasibility Analysis is likely time-consuming and manual Waiting Manager Approval often waits in a queue Rigid Split Hardcoded If Type Standard Custom logic Manual Re-evaluation Re-evaluate Conditions after rejection is slow No Context Approval happens after everything is prepared

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 3. Brainstorming Optimizations Predictive Analytics Front-end Routing predict risk necessity of customization before deep analysis Action Integrate AI scoring at the start Automation AI Task replacements Replace Perform Custom Feasibility Analysis with AI-powered tool real-time data scraping Automate Credit Check Inventory Check API calls Dynamic Resource Allocation Parallelism Speed High Risk assign specialized team priority routing multi-tier approval SLA-busting dispatcher Workflow Flexibility Remove strict Standard vs Custom early Streamline Approval loop propose Quick Fix subprocess

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: 4. Drafting the Redesign Strategy Structure Introduction Acknowledge goal speed flexibility Phase 1 Predictive Onboarding Change Add scoring engine instead of type check Impact Faster routing reduced manual triage Phase 2 Automation AI in Validation Change AI for Custom Analysis Parallel APIs for Checks Impact Higher accuracy faster turnaround Phase 3 Intelligent Approval Resource Allocation Change Dynamic resource assignment complexity multi-stage approval Impact Reduced bottlenecks Phase 4 Post-Process Exception Handling Change Automated loop minor fixes vs full re-submission

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 5. Fleshing out the Details Iterative refinement Predictive Analytics Request Scoring Engine Task Pre-Analyze Request using ML Outcome High Low Complexity buckets Automation AI-Driven Feasibility Analysis Replace manual with chatbot rule engine checks specs against catalog limits Resource Allocation Tiered Routing score low Auto-approve Level 1 score high Specialist Manager Approval Loop If Re-evaluate Auto-Correct Auto-Update Specs

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 6. Refining the BPMN Description mapping back to the prompt structure need to describe the new pseudo-BPMN flow or clearly explain the changes to the existing one describe the optimized process flow

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 7. Addressing Impact Metrics Performance Less time waiting approval less manual checking Customer Satisfaction Faster confirmation proactive rejection updates Complexity Higher initial setup data model AI lower operational fatigue

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: 8. Drafting the Response Mental Outline Headline Optimized Strategy Predictive Automated Agile Section 1 Predictive Tier Replace Check Request Type with AI-Based Request Scoring Logic predict Standard Potential Custom High-Value Benefit Stops non-standard early Section 2 Automation Parallelism Task B2 Feasibility AI Tool Task C1 C2 Automated APIs Benefit Near-instant feedback Section 3 Dynamic Resource Management Gateway Assign Resource Based on Complexity Tier 1 Agent vs Specialist Section 4 Re-evaluate Loop Change H to Auto-Adjustment Protocol Section 5 Impact Analysis

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 9. Review against Constraints Did I leverage automation Yes AI APIs Dynamic resources Yes Tiered routing Predictive analytics Yes Pre-analysis scoring Changes to tasks gateways Yes Impact discussion Yes

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: 10. Self-Correction during drafting The original flow had specific paths for Custom Analysis Feasible The new flow should perhaps make this more seamless If AI says Yes proceed to Quote If AI says No offer alternatives immediately flexibility
